translation.machine_usage_content:
Dear Tennant Customer,
Enclosed is your IRIS generated machine usage report. Machine reports provide usage data critical to driving operational consistency and efficiency. Please be sure to review the enclosed information from your IRIS enabled machines.
translation.runtime_content:
Dear Tennant Customer,
Enclosed is your IRIS generated machine run time report. Machine reports provide usage data critical to driving operational consistency and efficiency. Please be sure to review the enclosed information from your IRIS enabled machines.
translation.critical_alerts_details_bold: Enclosed is a list of critical alerts for your Tennant cleaning equipment received in the past 24 hours.
translation.critical_alerts_details: Alerts are generated from several different circumstances to keep you informed on where the machine is located and how the machine is being used. Please note the date and time the alert was generated may differ from the date and time the alert was received due to mobile network coverage.

critical_alerts.title: Critical Alerts
critical_alerts.truncated_message: The requested report exceeds email size limits. The complete list of data is available in the Portal.

service_request_alerts.title: Service Request Alert
service_request_alerts.details_bold: Enclosed is a list of service request alerts for your Tennant cleaning equipment received in the past 24 hours.
service_request_alerts.details: Each service request will have a status of “CREATED” until it is closed out and marked as “COMPLETED.” Please note the date and time the alert was generated may differ from the date and time the alert was received due to mobile network coverage.

maintenance_reminder_alerts.subject: Tennant Maintenance Reminder
maintenance_reminder_alerts.title: Maintenance reminder
maintenance_reminder_alerts.details_bold: Enclosed is a list of maintenance reminder alerts for your {model}s received in the past 24 hours.
maintenance_reminder_alerts.details: These machines have all reached a threshold for cleaning hours and it is recommended that they receive maintenance as outlined in the manual.

reasons.squeegee_blade_damage: Squeegee blades should be inspected for damage and proper deflection
reasons.squeegee_caster_damage: Squeegee casters should be inspected for damage
reasons.vacuum_hose_damage: Vacuum hose should be inspected for clogs or damage
reasons.flow_line_damage: Solution flow line and filter should be inspected for clogs and damage
reasons.tank_hose_damage: Recovery tank drain hose should be inspected for clogs or damage
reasons.pad_brush_wear_tear: Pads or Brush Assembly should be inspected for wear and tear
reasons.tank_lid_damage: Recovery tank lid seal should be inspected for damage
reasons.debris_tray_damage: Debris tray should be inspected for clogs or damage
reasons.squeegee_reservoir_clog: Squeegee assembly drip trap reservoir should be inspected for clogs
reasons.two_squeegee_blade_damage: Side and rear Squeegee blades should be inspected for damage and proper deflection
reasons.sensors_damage: Front/side 2D and 3D sensors and upper/lower LIDAR sensors should be inspected for damage and dirt
reasons.perimeter_guards_damage: Left, right, and front Perimeter guards should be inspected for damage, debris and wear

fixes.rotate_replace_squeegee_blade: Each squeegee blade has four wiping edges. Rotate the blades to an unused edge. If all four edges are worn, replace squeegee blades. Check squeegee blade deflection to the floor. Rear blade should deflect evenly across the full length of the squeegee at 45 degrees
fixes.lubricate_replace_caster: Lubricate rear casters. If worn, replace rear casters
fixes.flush_replace_vacuum_hose: Flush vacuum hose. Check for damage and replace if damaged
fixes.drain_rinse_tank_clean_filter: Drain and rinse out the solution tank. Remove and clean solution tank filter
fixes.check_replace_solution_filter: Check solution filter for damage and replace if damaged
fixes.clean_replace_drain_hose: Clean and flush recovery drain hose. Check for damage and replace if damaged
fixes.replace_worn_pad_brush: Replace Pads or Brush Assembly if worn or damaged
fixes.flush_tank_clean_screen: Flush Recovery Tank. Remove and clean the float shut-off screen
fixes.clean_replace_tank_lid: Clean recovery tank lid seal. Replace if damaged
fixes.clean_replace_debris_tray: Remove and clean debris tray. Replace if damaged
fixes.remove_drip_trap_clean_reservoir: Remove the drip trap cover from the squeegee assembly and clean reservoir
fixes.rotate_replace_rear_squeegee_blades: Each rear squeegee blade has two wiping edges. Rotate the blades to an unused edge. If all edges are worn, replace squeegee blades. Each side squeegee blade has four wiping edges. Rotate the blades to an unused edge. Once both edges are worn, swap squeegee blades from one side of the machine to the other to use the opposite edges. Replace blades when all edges are worn. Check squeegee blade deflection to the floor
fixes.check_clean_replace_sensors: Check for sensor damage. Clean with provided microfiber cloth. Replace if damaged
fixes.replace_perimeter_bristles: Replace damaged and/or worn perimeter bristle assemblies. Inspect adjustment plates for slipping. Adjust as necessary
fixes.flush_recovery_tank: Flush Recovery Tank. Remove and clean the float shut-off screen. Clean and flush recovery drain hose. Check for damage and replace if damaged
fixes.clean_replace_solution_filter: Drain and rinse out the solution tank. Remove and clean solution tank filter. Check solution filter for damage and replace if damaged

update_hour_meter_email.subject: Machine Serial {machineId} Hour Meter Updated
update_hour_meter_email.title: Audit Hour Meter
update_hour_meter_email.details_bold: The Hour Meter for Machine Serial {machineId} was updated.
update_hour_meter_email.details: This was done to match the portal with the hour meter on the machine.

reports.truncated_message: The requested report exceeds email size limits. The complete list of data is available in the Portal.

csv_export_headers.Avg Hrs of Usage Per Charge: Avg Hrs of Usage Per Charge
